About me

I'm currently doing a BCom informatics at Tuks. A few things I like to do when I have time off is to play games with friends. We tend to play a varity of games as time goes on and at this point of time, we play Dota 2, World Of Warships and CS:GO.

I'm also an introvert and therefore enjoy meeting new animals rather than people. Furthermore, I love coding and creating something from said code and an added bonus would be to have music on in the background.
